scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,admin,api -c blue,magenta,green "pnpm --filter web dev" "pnpm --filter admin dev" "pnpm --filter api dev"
scripts.db:push: pnpm --filter api exec prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: pnpm --filter api exec prisma db seed
scripts.start: concurrently -n api,web,admin -c green,blue,magenta "pnpm --filter api start" "pnpm --filter web start" "pnpm --filter admin start"
